item.title: links
item.description: Collection of links. Useful links Title Description GTFOBins A curated list of Unix binaries that can be exploited by an attacker to bypass local security restrictions CyberChef A s1imple, intuitive web app for carrying out all manner of “cyber” operations within a web browser.
